[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened later at the supermarket.
It was so awkward that I haven't been able to go back to that shopping street for a while.
……Well, if you say cats are cute, then yeah.

Vanilla: "Hm? Sniff sniff sniff…"
Vanilla: "There's an amazing smell coming from over there."
Chocola: "Really! It smells so fragrant and delicious, Master!"
Kashou: "Indeed. This scent…"

They turn their faces toward the direction of the smell.

[Street Cat Vendor]: "Welcome~!"
[Street Cat Vendor]: "How about some freshly made delicious takoyaki?"
[Street Cat Vendor]: "Hot and fresh takoyaki with plenty of bonito flakes, how about it?"

Chocola: "Wow, a cat running a takoyaki stand! That's rare, Master!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "So I can be a good girl!"
Vanilla: "Shigure is strict. But thanks to that, I've learned a lot."
店主: "Is that so? You have a wonderful Master, don't you?"
Chocola: "Ah, but Master is Master!"
Chocola: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"
Vanilla: "In translation, Shigure is a precious friend."
Vanilla: "Only my own Master gets called 'Master.'"
店主: "Ahaha. You're really loved, aren't you, Master?"
Kashou: "Well, I'm grateful for that."
He's gently nudged with an elbow.
He responds with an embarrassed smile.
...It's a bit embarrassing to be like this outside.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
A merciless electronic sound rings from the cellphone being stared at.
……I thought if I just got in touch with Shigure, it would be resolved right away.

Chocola: "Hamu, ngu ngu ngu, breakfast is so delicious!"
Chocola: "Master's food is always delicious~ nyaa♪"

Vanilla: "Chocola, you have ketchup on your cheek."
Vanilla: "It's adorably artistic. I'll lick it off for you. Pero pero."

The people in question are happily munching on sandwiches.
By the way, they're filled with tomato, cheese, and lettuce,
with a half-cooked sunny-side-up egg tucked inside—a simple affair.
For breakfast, that's about right.

Kashou: "You two, today you're definitely going home, got it?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
With a bright smile, the bill and pen are handed over.
Kashou: "Well, um..."

He takes the bill again to check it carefully.
Kashou: "...It seems like this isn't what I ordered."

[Dishware Vendor]: "...Eh, really?"
[Dishware Vendor]: "So, does that mean the items are different?"

Kashou: "No, it looks like what I ordered is in there too..."
He glances toward the stacked cardboard boxes inside the shop.
Mountains and mountains of cardboard boxes piled up in the small store—almost the entire interior was filled with them.

Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need this many dishes at our place..."

[Dishware Vendor]: "S-Sorry! I'll confirm with headquarters right away!"
[Dishware Vendor]: "Would you mind waiting for a moment?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[食器業者]: "It seems there was a mistake on our end, and this order got mixed up with another one..."
[食器業者]: "...I believe you at Minaduki-sama will need these items soon as well..."
[食器業者]: "...If it's convenient for you, we would appreciate it if you could receive the ordered tableware..."

[嘉祥]: "Receive the ordered items..."
[嘉祥]: "...Eh? From in here?"

A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.
Words fail him unintentionally.

They're all identical boxes.
You can't tell what's inside until you open them.
Moreover, looking at the invoices, they're all high-end tea sets and tableware.
So, you have to handle them with extreme care or something terrible could happen.

[嘉祥]: "Well, since we do need these for opening preparations, it would be great if we could take them today..."
[嘉祥]: "...But taking all of this right now... that's going to take quite some time, isn't it?"

[Chocola & Vanilla]: "Jee~"

Glancing at the sorted dishes,

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "...If I could just live as simply as a cat, things would probably be a lot easier."
He glanced at the store name on the window while letting go of his wry smile and began putting away the newly arrived tea set.

Vanilla: "Huh? That takoyaki stand isn't here today."
The same evening park street as yesterday.
But today, there were no stalls in sight.
Even if I wanted to send the cats back home, no one was around today.
I had also left my family's key behind.
So, until Shigure returns, I'll adjust the time and go shopping.

Chocola: "...Eh? Aah, s-sorry, Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it again, catnip?"
Vanilla: "Something like that."

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you rest a bit?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just for a little while..."
Chocola: "But I'm fine, really. Sorry for worrying you, Master."
Kashou: "...There's no need to apologize about that."
She bows her head with a troubled smile.
He knows exactly why she's feeling down.
That's why he stays silent.

Kashou: "Well, there's a bench right over there, so let's rest for a bit."
Vanilla: "Then I'll go buy some drinks."
Kashou: "Yeah, thanks. For everyone."
Vanilla: "Got it. Leave it to me."
He hands Vanilla some change and guides Chocola to the bench.
The strong sea breeze rustles through the park's trees.

Even if the road ahead of us is uncertain...
I lovingly rubbed their heads, disheveling their hair.

While feeling a little anxious about their destination.
He ruffles both of their heads affectionately.

If she were going to answer honestly, she'd just say it outright.
That's just like the Shigure of old.

Shigure: "I understand what Master says..."
Shigure: "But cats are clever creatures. They can become family members or partners to humans."
Shigure: "...precisely because of that"
She pauses for a moment.
With a troubled smile, she looks at me.
Shigure: "...I think it must be lonely when no one relies on you?"
Her smile makes my chest ache sharply.

She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.

The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」

tightly gripping her phone.

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」

My head can't keep up with the unexpected scene from this morning.

Shigure: "Good morning, Brother-sama."

Her bright, cloudless smile.
The other cats are also smiling at me in the same way.
I feel a cold sweat trickling down,

Kashou: "Haa… thought? About what…?"
Somehow, I manage to say only that.

Shigure: "But the fact remains that as a sister, I've been kept up at night with worry over you..."
Shigure: "Therefore, increasing our personnel to reduce Brother-sama's burden seems the most sensible solution—and that's what Shigure concluded."

Kashou: "……Haa."

Question:

鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」

Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.

Before I knew it, I was in a nighttime park.

Kashou: "Ah..."
I had left my house keys and wallet—everything—in my bag back at the house.

Kashou: "...What am I doing?"
Chocola: "...Master."
Kashou: "Chocola?!"
Vanilla: "Master, you forgot something."
Vanilla was holding my bag in her hands.

Kashou: "You brought it for me, Vanilla?"

Kashou: "Yeah, I guess so."
Without the keys, not only would I be locked out, but both of them wouldn't be able to get into the house either.

Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
There was something I wanted to ask my supplier. It wasn't urgent, but it would be better to call sooner rather than later.
For a privately-run patisserie, this is probably normal, but I handle negotiations with each of my suppliers myself.
Even for ingredients not commonly distributed, if you're buying in bulk, there are farms willing to sell.
The pursuit of flavor was also a journey to find the right ingredients.
While everyone else was getting excited about sightseeing, talking about work would be rude, so I said I had personal business and left the room.
Just to be safe, I even left the inn and found a quiet place to talk.
I made the call.

Kashou: "Phew..."
Though they were surprised by the order from overseas, it seemed like they would manage to ship it.
I returned to the inn.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Let me try one."
He bought a steamed manju from a street vendor.
It was freshly made and piping hot.
Taking a bite, it was fluffy yet had a moist texture, more so than he expected.
The sweet red bean paste crumbled softly on his tongue, spreading its sweetness.

Minaduki Kashou: "I see... hoo hoo... this is delicious."
Neither the Western pastries I make nor the traditional sweets from my family are served warm.
Eating a hot manju while saying 'hoo hoo' was an interesting experience in itself.

Minaduki Kashou: "Come to think of it, I've come to the hot spring town several times... but never eaten anything."
That's because there were no cats back then.
Even when traveling with my parents, Shigure, and me as a family of four, buying snacks on the go was never an option.

metadata:

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hey, were you here, Shigure? Did something happen?"
Shigure: "No, I'm fine now."
Kashou: "Was that a work call for you too, Shigure?"
Shigure: "...Yes. I'm sorry. During such a nice trip..."
Kashou: "There's no need to apologize. La Soleil is closed today, but it's a weekday out there."

Shigure seems to run her own company.
With her income, she buys clothes for the cats and pays for Bell's exam fees.
Her father is strict with me but spoils his daughter Shigure. He lets her handle cat matters and business freely.

Kashou: "The cats were all enjoying themselves. Playing table tennis, games... shopping at the stall."

metadata:

そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Shigure: "That's wonderful to hear.... Brother, how about we spend some time together as siblings without anyone else around?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Sure, but what do you want to do?"
Minaduki Shigure: "I heard there’s a karaoke room here?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Karaoke... I only went once back in high school. Shigure, can you sing?"
Minaduki Shigure: "I did choir as a child, so a little."

It was decided then.

Minaduki Shigure: "Then, putting my feelings for Brother into it..."
As she began to sing, the atmosphere completely changed.
Minaduki Shigure: "～～～♪"
Minaduki Kashou: "... Amazing."
Minaduki Shigure: "Phew~, I haven’t raised my voice like that in a while."
Minaduki Kashou: "You’re incredibly good!"
To be honest, she was professional-level. I gave her enthusiastic applause.

[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」

[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」

reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
Fraise: "I admired my brother... and was helping out at the shop."
Beignet: "And then you insisted on becoming the shop's cat and staying to help, even choosing the name Fraise for yourself."
Kashou: "Ah, I recall that cats are named around three months old. So that's where your name comes from..."
Fraise: "But my brother is going through a tough time right now... I thought I shouldn't say anything about myself."
Fraise: "I've been dreaming of eating macarons for so long... but I just couldn't hold back anymore..."
Shigure: "It's okay, Fraise. You don't have to hold back so much. Master will understand."
Kashou: "Yeah, of course he will. Thanks for remembering, Fraise."
Kashou: "And thank you too, Mentor. I'm really grateful for all your help."

Question:
[時雨]: 「間違いありません。話題になったことで大勢が情報を調べ、名店という評価が多かったからこそ。相乗効果です」
[嘉祥]: 「俺としては、師匠の素晴らしいケーキをより多くの人が知ってくれたから、嬉しいけど」
[フレーズ]: 「ううぅ……明日もこの調子だと、ちょっと大変かもしれません」
[ベニエ]: 「今日が特別だったのよ、きっと」
[ベニエ]: 「今日みたいな行列は、明日はないと思うわ」
[フレーズ]: 「そうですよね……明日は、またパティシエールとわたしだけになりますから」
俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。
結局、俺は自分に足りないものが、まだわからないでいた。
気持ち的には、だいぶ楽になったのだが……
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That is absolutely right. The shop becoming a hot topic led to a majority of people looking into information, which led to a lot of rave reviews. It's synergy.」
[Kashou]: 「Personally, I'm glad that a lot of people know about your incredible cakes, Mentor.」
[Fraise]: 「Unghhh... If tomorrow is like it was today, then we might have more than a little problem.」
[Beignet]: 「I'm sure that today was just a special case.」
[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...
ModelAnswer:

Kashou: "For me, I'm just happy that more people got to know Mentor's wonderful cakes."
Fraise: "Uuugh…… If tomorrow is like this too, it might be a bit tough."
Beignet: "Today was probably special."
Beignet: "I don't think there will be lines like today tomorrow."
Fraise: "That's right…… Tomorrow, it'll just be the patissière and me again."

We were scheduled to leave tonight. The time difference between France and Japan is 7 hours. To return home within the promised three days, we needed to leave around that time.

In the end, I still didn't realize what was missing in myself.
Emotionally, I had lightened up quite a bit, though……

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「あ、すみません……」

[嘉祥]: 「あ……まぁ……まだ、父親の言う芯ってのは、よくわかっていません」

[嘉祥]: 「俺は、なんだか、いろいろと考えすぎて……最初の気持ちを忘れていたというか……」
[嘉祥]: 「口では目指していると言いつつ、別のことに捕らわれていたように思います」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Oh, my apologies...」
[Beignet]: 「Looks like I wasn't able to help after all.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's not true!」
[Kashou]: 「Eh. Well... I'm just still lost on what my father meant by a 'core'.」
[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」
[Beignet]: 「...Thank you. It warms my heart to hear you say that.」
[Kashou]: 「It's sort of like I've been thinking of so much... I've lost sight of my initial focus...」
[Kashou]: 「I may have said that was my goal, but I was trapped by something else.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Ah, I'm sorry..."
Beignet: "In the end, I couldn't be of any help."
Kashou: "No, not at all!"
Kashou: "Ah... well... I still don't fully understand what my father meant by 'the core' of things."
Kashou: "But coming to this place and helping out in the shop made me remember."
Kashou: "I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces."
Kashou: "The cakes you make, Mentor, are truly delicious and have such a kind taste... they really bring smiles to everyone."
Beignet: "...Thank you. It makes me happy to hear you say that."
Kashou: "I think I was overthinking things... forgetting my original feelings, so to speak..."
Kashou: "While saying I aimed for it with words, I feel like I was caught up in other things."

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「ありがとうございます」

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「Just as I've said before, I don't know what your father meant, but I support you, regardless.」
[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:
Beignet: "As I've said before, I don't understand Master's father's true intentions, but I'm cheering for you."

Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you."

Minaduki Kashou: "By the way, I've talked about why I make cakes many times... but I've never heard about your past, Mentor."

Beignet: "...I suppose so."

Minaduki Kashou: "Well, when I asked before, you said it was because I'm a pastry chef..."

Beignet: "Fufu... was that the case?"

Minaduki Kashou: "Then, what was the reason you became a pastry chef?"

Beignet: "...This shop... has been in my grandmother's family for generations, and we've always made cakes."

Beignet: "It's not as long-standing as your family's tradition, but I believe there are traditions worth preserving."

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」

Beignet: "Around that time... my son said that the sweets I made would make everyone smile."
Beignet: "My son told me, 'Mom is like the sun.'"
Beignet: "That's why I named this shop La Soleil."

Finally hearing the story behind La Soleil made me happy.
But it seemed there was more to the tale than just happiness.

Shigure: "...You loved your child... your family very much, didn't you?"
Beignet: "Yes, indeed."
Beignet: "But I had to leave Japan."
Beignet: "The brother who was supposed to take over this shop passed away at a young age..."

Beignet: "Yes. We might never have met Fraise."

[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」
[Kashou]: 「Perhaps, but nothing is certain, which is why... I think you should give your son a visit.」

Kashou: "But if the son has grown up, maybe he could understand his mentor's feelings too."
Beignet: "Isn't that just a convenient fantasy for me?"
Kashou: "It might be. But we don't know. That's why I think... you should meet your son."
Kashou: "I'm sorry for being so presumptuous."
Fraise: "I also think the same as my brother, Mentor."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Awayuki (水無月 淡雪) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Waa, is this a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother-sama!"
Awayuki: "It might be a little early, but Kashou might get mad and leave again, don't you think?"
Shigure: "Uh..."
Kashou: "T-that won't happen today! Please trust me."
Awayuki: "Yes, even Kashou."
Kashou: "Ah, um... thanks."
Awayuki: "Open it?"

Following her words, he removed the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
Kashou: "...A photo frame?"
It seems there's no photo inside.

Awayuki: "If you put one of this year's memorable photos in your room, I think you'll find it enjoyable."
Come to think of it, Mother had been wanting one, so Shigure gave her a present on her birthday.

metadata:
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "Master's! Ah, but which photo should I... umm..."
Chocola: "Ah, let's use the one from when La Soleil opened. The one where Master, Vanilla, and I took together!"
Vanilla: "Good idea. Great choice. I'll do that too."
Maple: "What about me, I wonder?"
Cinnamon: "How about that one? When we sang together on the boat."
Cinnamon: "We got photos taken along with the video, right~?"
Maple: "Ah—."
Maple: "...I suppose. It's a little embarrassing, but..."
Maple: "That was the most precious memory for me this past year."
Cinnamon: "In Maple-chan's most precious memory... I'm in it too... hahaha... ugh"
Maple: "Huh? But that photo only has me in it..."
